text: Congressman Jared Moskowitz (D-FL) dared House Republicans to hold a vote on impeaching President Biden and emphasizing the lack of evidence. The Morning Joe panel discusses how the GOP's baseless impeachment talk serves as a distraction from real issues, criticizing the misuse of media in promoting unfounded allegations.March 21, 2024
title: 'Making idiots of themselves': Joe demolishes GOP's sham Biden impeachment push
author: MSNBC
